tools.name: create_pattern
tools.description: Create and save a LED pattern to a persistent slot (1-5). The pattern is defined by mathematical expressions for Hue, Saturation, and Brightness. Variables: theta (0~2π), t (time in seconds), i (LED index 0~11). Functions: sin, cos, tan, abs, sqrt, floor, ceil, max(a,b), min(a,b), mod(a,b), pow(a,b). Logic: (expr) ? 1.0 : 0.0 for conditionals.

slot.description: Slot number to save to (1-5). Slot 0 is reserved.

tools.name: change_slot
tools.description: Change device state to execute a specific pattern slot. Slot 0: Stop pattern and return to IDLE (Blinking). Slots 1-5: Execute persistent pattern. Slot 6: Blackout (Turn off all LEDs). Duration > 0: Auto-return to IDLE after time. Duration = 0: Loop forever (Default).

duration.description: Duration in seconds. 0 = Infinite loop (until changed).

tools.name: slot_status
tools.description: Check the status of all pattern slots (1-5). Returns name, formulas, valid status, and active status for each slot.
